item.title: [pi] Clan chat help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

Okay, so I’ve been trying to figure out a way to make it so only mods+ can create a certain clan chat name…

i’ve fooled around and got something like this…

if(c.clanId == “Help” && c.playerRighs < 1) {
c.sendMessage(“the help clan chat is currently closed”);
}

i know this isn’t right at all but at least I’m trying right

Read full topic
